publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-136 Mr Jamie Stone: Sheep Industry—That the Parliament acknowledges the current crisis in the sheep industry in Caithness, Sutherland and Easter Ross following this summer’s lamb sales in the constituency. Supported by: Mr John Munro*, George Lyon*, Euan Robson*, Nora Radcliffe*, Robert Brown*

S1M-136# Mr Jamie Stone: Sheep Industry—That the Parliament acknowledges the current crisis in the sheep industry in Caithness, Sutherland and Easter Ross following this summer’s lamb sales in the constituency. Supported by: Mr John Munro, George Lyon, Euan Robson, Nora Radcliffe, Robert Brown

S1M-136# Mr Jamie Stone: Sheep Industry—That the Parliament acknowledges the current crisis in the sheep industry in Caithness, Sutherland and Easter Ross following this summer’s lamb sales in the constituency. Supported by: Mr John Munro, George Lyon, Euan Robson, Nora Radcliffe, Robert Brown

S1M-136# Mr Jamie Stone: Sheep Industry—That the Parliament acknowledges the current crisis in the sheep industry in Caithness, Sutherland and Easter Ross following this summer’s lamb sales in the constituency. Supported by: Mr John Munro, George Lyon, Euan Robson, Nora Radcliffe, Robert Brown

S1M-136# Mr Jamie Stone: Sheep Industry-That the Parliament acknowledges the current crisis in the sheep industry in Caithness, Sutherland and Easter Ross following this summer's lamb sales in the constituency. Supported by: Mr John Munro, George Lyon, Euan Robson, Nora Radcliffe, Robert Brown
S1M-136# Sheep Industry (lodged on 8 September 1999) Fergus Ewing*

S1M-136# Mr Jamie Stone: Sheep Industry—That the Parliament acknowledges the current crisis in the sheep industry in Caithness, Sutherland and Easter Ross following this summer’s lamb sales in the constituency. Supported by: Mr John Munro, George Lyon, Euan Robson, Nora Radcliffe, Robert Brown, Fergus Ewing

S1M-136# Mr Jamie Stone: Sheep Industry—That the Parliament acknowledges the current crisis in the sheep industry in Caithness, Sutherland and Easter Ross following this summer’s lamb sales in the constituency. Supported by: Mr John Munro, George Lyon, Euan Robson, Nora Radcliffe, Robert Brown, Fergus Ewing
S1M-136# Sheep Industry (lodged on 8 September 1999) Mr Mike Rumbles*

S1M-136# Mr Jamie Stone: Sheep Industry—That the Parliament acknowledges the current crisis in the sheep industry in Caithness, Sutherland and Easter Ross following this summer’s lamb sales in the constituency. Supported by: Mr John Munro, George Lyon, Euan Robson, Nora Radcliffe, Robert Brown, Fergus Ewing, Mr Mike Rumbles
